casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. BOBBY GENE SALTER (14806)

Dupont, C. J., and Schaller and Spear, Js.

Argued December 13, 1995 decision released January 23, 1996 Michael J. Melly, for the appellant (defendant). SusannE. Gill, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, *912and Gerard P. Eisenman, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
